alert.note: Alert for Campbell; McPherson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 6:17PM MDT until July 21 at 7:15PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Campbell County in north central South Dakota... Western McPherson County in north central South Dakota... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 716 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Zeeland, or 20 miles northwest of Eureka, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Artas around 730 PM CDT. Greenway around 735 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Eureka, Hillsview and New Town Corner. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
